case.state: E-Eh?! {embarrassed}I d-didn't expect someone else from Mondstadt would be here...{!reset}
Oh, salutations to thee as well, Sucrose! Shalt we have a gracious game together, then.

Ah, the library.. such a lonesome, solitude-ridden place; and yet the smell of antique books fills the air.
{color}( Mein Fräulein, would you prefer me to guide you to the fairy tale isle? ){!reset}
I wonder if I would find the 'Witch of Purple Rose' here..
It seems to be my birthday. Shall this be my present?
My name is Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, otherwise titled as the Ruler of the Ashen Darkness; a name fitting of the epithets bestowed upon royals in my home world, Immernachtreich.
'Strip poker'..? What belligerent form of entertainment comes from removing of one's equipment?

I expect thee lack nefarious intentions for inviting me here...
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, do not be paranoid. This place lacks the vile stench of a Hilichurl camp. ) {!reset}
Even now, this world already reeks of a twilight-stained calamity..
The threads of fate intertwine my arrival to this unknown locations.. maybe it was determined in the stars?
Destiny has brought me hither!
E-Eh?! {embarrassed}I thought I'd meet new people, not people from Mondstadt...{!reset}
{embarrassed}Well, this is annoying... I came here to meet new people...{!reset}
{embarrassed}E-Er... promise you guys won't spread any rumors about us all being here?{!reset}

For it isn't the assistant alchemist of Mondstadt! Shalt this be a learning experience for both of us, Sucrose!
{color}( It is pleasant to see you as well, Sucrose. Let's have a nice game today. ){!reset}
(Maybe I can use this chance to learn about what Albedo is! He's always unnerved me...)

A-Ah! A ghost!
{color}( Mein Fräulein, are you afraid? ){!reset}
You shall be glad that a particular figure back in Teyvat is not present...
Another mortal kin to royalty? Hopefully this fateful encounter does not end in a war of succession..
Us fellow royalty shalt stay together.. hm? What do you mean I'm not a real princess?!
A weapon? I've seen many people in Teyvat carry them around, as I carry around mein own bow, but to a strip poker gamer...? Isn't that a bit vulgar, mortal?

Poetry? Hast thee ever written fantasy poetry? Most people choose to inscribe poetry relating to their encounters in life, but some people prefer to think outside the box... it's all depending on how thy creativity and ingeniousness is.
Hmmm... I know a few individuals with a profound appreciation for poetry, albeit their way of poetry is of controvertible nature. Hopefully you are not homogeneous to thee, mortal.

Oh, Oz! ~name~ has a companion as well! Maybe thou two can get along nicely during this game!
{color}( I won't guarantee anything, but I'll keep an eye on them. ){!reset}
Hu Tao, thy director of thee 'Wangsheng Funeral Parlor'.. I presume the threads of fate have guided you to this provocative accommodation as well?
I pray that thy intentions are less grim than thy marketing practices...

The assistant alchemist of the Knights of Favonius.. thy arrival is unexpected, due to thy sheepish and modest temperament.
{color}( Mein Fräulein means that she did not expect to see you here, Sucrose. ){!reset}

What is the true nature of thy captain, Albedo? I have a few theories connecting him and the Archons...
{color}( Mein Fräulein, please refrain from asking such indecent questions! ){!reset}

The humble maid of Mondstadt.. how has thy knightly practices been aiding your guidance?
{color}( She means to ask how your training has been going. ){!reset}
Another opponent of unimaginable tenacity has brought thyself to the playing fields..?!
Barbara, the pure maiden hailing from Mondstadt... does the Dandelion Knight know thee is here?
Hmmm... I didn't expect someone as holy as thee to come here...

{color} ( Mein Fräulein, isn't that the deaconess of the Church of Favonius? ){!reset}
It seems so, my trusty servant... this will be interesting...
I feel it.. ~name~, you have a vision? Quite particular...
{embarrassed} E-Erm.. daddy? A-Ah, well...{!reset} Your majesty has no problem calling thee that, of course! {embarrassed} It's just a bit embarrassing, though... {!reset}
Daddy? {embarrassed} A-Ahem.. err... that's an interesting name... {!reset}

Master? Hmph! I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort serveth no one! I shall oblige by thy silly rules, but only this one game! Afterwards, once I victoriously triumph, I shall show who's really the master of this game!

Thy title is 'Master'...? Fine! Show me, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort and the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} how good thee truly art to get a denomination as vigorous as that one, mortal!

Hmm...? A butterfly? Oz, is this a friend of thee?
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, I am not aware of any butterflies... they likely are from a different realm. ) {!reset}

I shall acquiesce thy invitation to 'strip poker'... as to prove my vigorous strength, whether in combat or in elementary card games.
{color} ( Lady Fischl means to say that she'll play with you. ) {!reset}
The glory of your majesty shall show in thy game, proselytes!
Thee shall witness my swift victory in this game!
I do wonder if residents of Immernachtreich play a similar game resembling this one...?

Bask in the lonely gloom of midnight no longer, compatriots, as I have arrived to conquer...
{color} ( Mein Fräulein means to say she'll eradicate you in this game of Poker. ) {!reset}
My left eye? It is the all-seeing {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset}, which reveals all that is true in the world!
{color}( Her Majesty requests ~cards.text~. ){!reset}
The beckoning of the shadows tells me to get ~cards.text~, so I shall listen with amenable ears!
I request ~cards.text~, dealer.

I feel it.. the threads of fate are telling me to get ~cards.text~! This will ensure a swift victory in the near future!
{color}( She requests ~cards.text~ , please. ){!reset}
Hehehe, maybe I shall use mein investigation prowess to attain a tactical pattern in the dealer's card delivery- a-ahem! I-I mean, I'll take ~cards.text~, please.
Dealer, I request ~cards.text~!
Your majesty requests ~cards.text~.
Oz, how do I play- *cough* I mean, Oz, I am quite unfamiliar with this mortal realm's form of playing, but perhaps you and mine {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset} shall prove useful!
~cards~, mortal.
Hmmm... I assume ~cards.text~ would be the optimal strategy...
Oh, I see, I should get ~cards.text~...
Thy majesty is sure on this one!
I am quite confident about this one, dealer! Give me ~cards.text~! For it shalt be the hand that leads me to victory!
I think thy majesty will do...~cards~!
Hmmm... ~cards~, dealer!
{color}( Which were you thinking, mein Fräulein? ){!reset}
{color}(I think mein Fräulein would like ~cards.text~...){!reset}
Dealer, thy majesty requests ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
May the Archons bless this hand...
Hopefully this hand will prevent mein doom, hm?
What incredible fortuity! There is absolutely no way I, Fischl, {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}, will lose! This will surely give me an advantage over thee lot!
My {chuuni} 'Auge der Verurteilung' {!reset} shall see through any of thy wretched tricks and deceptions. With this, I shall guarantee a sufficient advantage....
Exceptional! This hand will show me the path of glory!
Stellar!

The screams of fate cry out my holy name as they give me the hand worthy enough of defeating thy darkness!
{color} ( Miss Fischl, you're getting lost in your imagination again. ) {!reset}
Excellent!

And this time, I was not utilizing mein power, for the strings of fate blessed thee!
{color}( Mein Fräulein, you just got lucky. ) {!reset}
I shalt stall the removal of mein robes by another day!
Quite superb!
This hand is magnificent!
phew.. Thank the heavens above...
Mein {chuuni}Edelstein der Dunkelheit{!reset} shalt protect me another day!
Thy darkness shalt be banished by the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung!{!reset}
Hm-hm!
This shadowed, mysterious world may not be so horrid after all...
Karma reigns supreme!

Behold, ~player~! My exceptional power of {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset} proves virtuous in times of desperation!
{color} ( ..She has a good hand, ~player~. ) {!reset}
The threads of fate will truly turn this game into mein favor! Prepare, mortals!
You shalt prepare to see thy majesty at her true power!
Mein {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} sees through impurities!
This shalt guide me far!
A hand befitting of a princess!
The power of this hand is barely enough to thrive...
A solemn hand...
For this hand is not as tenacious as mein {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset}, it is enough to surpass defeat..
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort...am not the proudest of this hand, albeit.. it seems enough to carry me to triumph.
Whilst it is safe, it is nothing exceptional.
(Am I the only one with a below average hand? I hope I don't lose...
Hmmm... alright, this will suffice.
This hand is neither below par nor above average.. as mortals of this realm would call it- 'boring', in their terms..
Fair...
This will do, I suppose.
Any unluckier, and I would've gotten a foul hand...
Tinkering on the border of good and bad...
This will work.
I suppose this is good enough.
Such a boring hand, but... it's good enough to help me ensure a victory, at the very least.
This likely won't lead to mein doom...
Well, it'll work for this round, but next round, I expect thy majesty to get better.
Triumph is not assured yet, however I will pursue on!
Fortuity is such a fickle thing. It can be either a tremendous reward that boosts you ahead of the competition, or such a major setback it's virtually worth to quit.
It is worth to keep, but not worth to celebrate.
Maybe this will help, I suppose... (Hmm... card games really are based on luck. Though, having good perception can also help?)
An omen of caliginosity lays ahead in my grim path...

..Shit-- w-wait, {embarrassed} don't tell my dad I said that! {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, don't use such obscene language! ) {!reset}
O heavens of Immernachtreich, tell me how I have angered thou so!

{embarrassed} ..hmph... {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, don't be upset. ) {!reset}
What is this trickery?!
{color} ( This hand seems below par considering your royal blood, mein Fräulein... ) {!reset}
Is this retribution..?
A cold breeze blows...
Sin defies fate's rightful decree!

Thou has doomed this world!
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, you're overreacting... ) {!reset}

The violet lightning will strike down whoever dealt me this hand!
{color} ( Miss Fischl, please do not get violent! ) {!reset}
H-How ghoulish!

Quite pitiable, is it not, Oz?
{color} ( I agree, mein Fräulein... Such a bad hand considering your luck. ) {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, you're going to be nude in no time! ) {!reset}
Preposterous! I am the {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung! {!reset} What mortal follies could venture to imprint themselves upon mein psyche?
I wonder if the fortuity from that boy at the Adventurer's Guild has rubbed off me...
(N-No way!)
Hmph... if thee wanted me to handicap mein glorious power, thee could've asked benevolently...
Impossible! The Prinzessin der Verurteilung cannot have a hand as pitiful as this!
W-With this speed, I'm truly going to...!
Such a humbling experience...
Sucrose! Thy choice in undergarments is beyond promiscuous.. and here, I thought thou were but a mild mannered assistant to the great Albedo...

Friendship? Friendship is but a key ingredient to one's bottomless happiness; for if one does not have a companion in thee life, they are surely missing out!
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, are you saying that because you enjoy my presence? ) {!reset}
For I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich; I am not naturally from this world, and therefore I was drawn by the threads of fate pleading for my arrival...
I-Indeed! For the threads of fate decide our paths and paves them as we go, maybe 'twas decided before we were even born to peregrinate here!

W-Well, I wouldn't be lying if I verbally expressed I found it... {embarrassed}nice...{embarrassed} B-But! Wearing that underneath thy main garments? If not due to it's flexibility, many would accumulate thee wast an exhibitionist, Sucrose!

Well, that's hard to say, mortal. For thee art graceful like the wind, availing others- very reminiscent of the Anemo Archon, Barbados--whilst I am adventurous and audacious much like Baal. B-But... {embarrassed}I wouldn't want you any other way, because you help out M-Mondstadt a lot with your Anemo Vision...{!reset}
Do not feel insecure about thy lack of another vision. I am sure that the Archons above gave us all a reason for our Vision, and you... {embarrassed} use it really well, Sucrose. {!reset}
Thy Anemo Vision suits thee, Sucrose. I do not cerebrate thy alchemy prowess would be at it's peak without it- for it avails thee in so many ways...

Of course, Sucrose! For it would be mein pleasure. {embarrassed}E-Erm, you can find me in the Adventurer's Guild if you need me. Just ask Bennett if you're ever looking for me, he basically lives at the Adventurer's Guild...{!reset}

Well, aside from adventuring different worlds and dimensions amongst the galaxies, I, Fischl, {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung,{!reset} love fairy tales! The fragrance of the antique tomes once thee flip amongst the pages, the chapters deep enough to fill thy heart with jubilance.. impeccable!
So skittish for a nurse... (The nurse at the church is so much more different than her... Mikan is shy, paranoid and skittish, while that deaconess is almost too happy and preachy...)
Thou quite remind me of a figure in the town thy majesty is residing at, Ignatz. Her name is Sucrose. Green hair, skittish, glasses... art thee proficiently adept at alchemy, by chance?
What art thou doing here, deaconess? Does thy older sister know thee ist here?
(Please don't tell me she's about to get all holy, even during when she strips...)
I find it impeccable how thou care so much about wild life, Fluttershy. Does thee have any good memories of animals in thy home land?
Fluttershy, Thy majesty has an important question. Does thee have any memories to reminiscence about the animals that thee takes care of?
'Hatsune Miku'...? Is thee some sort of idol? (D-Don't tell me she's related to the deaconess of the church who preaches about Barbatos constantly...)
Is thee a singer? What type of songs does thee sing? Thy majesty is quite curious!
Such a ghoulish ability, mortal! Tell me, is thee related to a particular figure in Teyvat..? Her name is 'Hu Tao'...
I've heard of plenty of figures in Teyvat with relations to ghost... hopefully thee art not a bad one.
Thy powers remind me of someone from Teyvat... 'Hu Tao'... does that sound familiar?

Oz, I beseech thou to implore on ~player~'s hand..
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, that's cheating! ) {!reset}
Even one of royal blood finds themselves in such a raunchy game...
May the glory of {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung {!reset} find thee all in good faith.

Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, I assure thou that my hand, no matter what condition, will surely save us from any unfortunate predicaments!
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, you cannot predict the future, even with your divine powers.. ) {!reset}
What do you mean I'm role playing? T-That's absurd!

Hmm.. do any of thou lot have a favorite fairy tale that thee concretely relish in?
{color} ( Mein Fräulein means to ask if any of you have a fairy tale you enjoy. ) {!reset}

After this, I inquire to head to the library within the Knights of Favonius headquarters, Oz. There are some books that I require to return...
{color}( Right, mein Fräulein. Which one was it? 'The Fox in the Dandelion Sea'? )
(I do hope my father doesn't get upset for staying out late.. even after turning 19 in May, he still treats me as if I'm a kid..)
I wonder if we could see Dragonspine from here? From mein home in Mondstadt, thee can only see the tippy top...
The place I'm adventuring currently is denominated 'Mondstadt'. It's one of the seven nations in Teyvat; and albeit I am quite unfamiliar with this world, it is fun to adventure in!

In Teyvat, there of plenty of different Archons that rule over the world thy majesty adventures within. The one in Mondstadt is designated 'Barbatos', who is known to be the God of Freedom. Interesting, hm?
Thy majesty spends her free time working in an Adventurer's Guild within Mondstadt. An investigator was what I was ranked, however I still spend mein free time exploring.
I wonder how that ill-starred boy is... I hope he's not getting himself into an extravagant amount of trouble while I'm gone, only the Archons know his horrible luck...
{color} ( Mein Fräulein commonly reads a lot of fairy tale novels in her free time. Her favorite is where she got my name, 'Oz'. ) {!reset}
Usually, I prefer to utilize a bow and arrow to reign down judgment upon thou lot. It's mein trusty weapon, and I have grown quite fond of it- paired with my holy powers of tenebrosity!

Thou art curious? Hmmm... well, I cannot gainsay that thy chemistry has been a source of curiosity for me as well, mortal. If I showeth thee the secrets of mein garments, thee shalt show me the secrets of Albed- *cough* I-I mean, thy alchemy, of course.

{embarrassed} E-Erm, no...{!reset} B-But! 'Tis only because the people of mein world art diligent doing... things! Like... Fighting pernicious Abyss Mages! You've heard of Abyss Mages, right? (Is she gonna buy that at all...?)
W-Well... of course it is to meet more people and adventure. Coming here, mein journey was a long one, and I still don't know how I got hither...

To meet more people, of course. Thy majesty does prefer to meet others, seeing as how many people ache for mein mystical enchantments... {embarrassed} It's also nice to just relax sometimes, I guess... {!reset}

Well, specifically speaking, I find many worlds denizens to be of nice appearance. They behave so differently compared to Teyvat and Immernachtreich, 'tis infeasible to estimate what they'll verbally express or react to next...

As thy eternal twilight blossoms within, it seems that my fate has been dictated by the one's above..
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, please do not speak in such extravagant terms that even I cannot comprehend. ) {!reset}
I, Fischl, {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung, {!reset} shall remove some of my garments now!
Thy majesty will reveal herself now. Do not become crimson-faced, however..
Thy eternal darkness is overwhelming mein royal heart...
This cruel fate befits not one of royal blood!
Rejoice at this lucky turn of fate, mortals!
Maybe the ropes of fate are being punishful for my sudden arrival here.. I knew it was not wise to tread on uncharted territory, especially of crude nature...
O heavens, did I do something truly unforgivable, aiding mein mortal enemy instead?! Is that why thou prefer me to bid farewell of my holy armor aiding me in combat?!

Is one of thee lot tearing the strings of fate and re-arranging them to thy will?!
{color} ( She means to ask if any of you all are cheating. ) {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, it seems that it is your turn to strip. ) {!reset}
I shall permit thee lot to see mein holy body, puny mortal!
{embarrassed} P...Promise you won't tell Dad, okay, Oz? {!reset}
It seems that it has come to this.. fear not, mortals! I shalt spare thee just this once and play thy little games, even if they embarrass me so...

As the {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung, {!reset} I shall show some humble compassion upon thou lot and rid myself of one of mein regalia...
{color} ( She's taking off her clothes now. ) {!reset}
Thy royalty will strip of her garments now, blessed with the sovereignty of Immernachtreich!
I, {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung {!reset} bestow upon thee a blessing to see more of mein imperial body!
{embarrassed} Shall this continue, I... {!reset}

The night's blood runs cold...
{color} ( Miss Fischl, please strip to avoid cheating. Nobody likes a 'sore loser', as people call them. ) {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, you're losing an abundance of your garments in such quick succession.. ) {!reset}

Hm...? Oh! O-Of course, mortal. For mein asymmetrical outfit helps the electric bounce through mein body like waves, currents even... engendering sparks of violet lightning that I dispose of through mein bow!
Home wilt always be... home, I conjecture. {embarrassed}Does that even make sense?{!reset} More so...it makes sense that thou art magnetized to what thee hath grown up around.

Maybe that is true... however, I would not giveth up mein vision for another one. I am jubilant with mein vision at the current moment, and it aids me in many different ways, such as bringing Oz to my companionship.
{color}( Hello, Sucrose. ){!reset}
Mein glorious amethyst ribbon, the perfect addition to mein luxurious gown outfit- blessed and tailored by the gods themselves...
Thou somehow persuaded myself to strip, so allow me, Ruler of the Ashen Darkness, to dispose of some of mein divine trinkets...
I'm not going to take off mein eye patch, fool. Does thee really want this mortal realm to crumble underneath the enormous power of mein {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung? {!reset}
This is my {chuuni} Dunkelnacht Sakrament {!reset}; my leotard adorned with only the finest of accessories for the Sovereign of Immernachtreich.
Do not touch mein celestial leotard, mortals; for if thee does so, the world will consume itself in the primal grasp of filth!

{color} ( Mein Fräulein, you've never stripped in front of anyone, have you? ) {!reset}
{embarrassed} Shush, Oz! {!reset}
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, do you need help? You seem to be struggling.. ) {!reset}
These gloves sanction me to wield mein bow preponderantly, but seeing as how I won't require to condemn judgment upon thee lot, I will take them off...
The gentle fabric sewn between the fabric as similarly to the ropes of fate intertwining to each other makes thy performance in battle against the darkness a lot easier.
The fabric of these are composed out of the finest silk, and consequently are quite soft and light, able to flow through the winds of Mondstadt quite easily.
I ascertained these were in prime condition in case I require to bestow punishment upon anyone.
I swear, you puny humans in the mortal realm have a thing for one's thigh highs...
...Do not stare excessively at mein thighs, mortal. If needed, I will employ mein {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} to erase any sinful thoughts thee may have.
W-Why do I wear these? I- They're just c-comfortable, mortal! D-Don't ask questions about mein apparel, their reasonings are far beyond thy mortal mind!
T-...The fashion in Immernachtreich is far beyond what thee can comprehend. {embarrassed}Don't ask questions.{!reset}

I suppose this is truly the cessation of mein stripping adventures...
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, are you disappointed with the lack of need to strip going forward? ) {!reset}

This mortal world surely has a strange way of reacting to nudity, hm?
{color} ( Your face is as red as the Pyro Archon's flame, mein Fräulein. ) {!reset}
Prepare thy mortal eyes to gaze upon thy royal body!
{embarrassed} Don't stare too hard, okay? {!reset}
Mein shoes? I use these for adventuring. Being from another world, mein traveling comes in many forms; whether traveling mountains or to the Mondstadt library.
I rather prefer to keep them on in case of an emergency; but if it is so required, so be it. Shalt the princess of judgment not dismiss any rules...

Thy majesty utilizes these to explore, primarily. However, the last time I peregrinated to Dragonspine, I ended up getting a plethora of snow in the soles of them and had to place them by the fireplace for them to dry...
I was ruminating whether I should take these off or not, but since it is strip poker, I suppose it would only be fair...
Being a princess, I hast no trouble wearing attire such as this. 'Tis what people in mein dimension bear, and I shalt not disregard their tradition. Call it self confidence if you want, mortal!

For I do not keep mein mind locked behind infeasible probabilities, it is fun to wonder what I would be akin to in different circumstances-- maybe with a Hydro Vision? I wonder if Oz would be an aquatic raven then...
The midnight phantasmagoria blesses all...
Even if I divest meinself of needless garments, I will never expose my {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung. {!reset} {embarrassed}D-Don't bother asking, mortal! {!reset}
This is the most primitive 'adventure' meinself has ever trailed upon...
Shall not be afraid, as the Mistress of Nirvana blesses thy radiant gaze with mein body...
I hope thy lot enjoy thy sumptuous body...

Brr.. the currents of a thousand winters strike mein body with their frigid caress!
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, do you need a scarf? ) {!reset}

Do not peer too much at my reverential body, mortals.
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, are you embarrassed? ) {!reset}
Without mein ribbon.. This is fine, mortal. Such a small trinket shall not hinder mein performance.
I wonder what I shall strip next.. maybe mein boots? Hmm...
I do miss the soft fabric, but it is fine...
It is peculiar feeling mein royal arms so breezy and gelid...
Well then, shall we proceed, mortals?
Hmph.. well, this should not obstruct me an extravagant amount.
I do not orchestrate to peregrinate anywhere, so this is an alright decision...
Let us proceed with the next round, mortals!
Only a modicum of things to take off next...

Oz, can thee assure that I won't lose next round? I didn't expect to actually need to take off this amplitude..
{color}( Mein Fräulein, I am not going to tamper with your cards in a way that gives you bonuses. ){!reset}
Mortals, let's proceed with the next round.
B-Brr...
W-Why are you asking why I chose this pair of underwear?! I-It's none of your business, mortal!
I didn't expect to... take off mein leotard, today...
I don't customarily wear a bra, it wasn't some marginally perverted move to get myself more proximate to being unclad...
(Should I have shaved today..?)
(I feel their gaze looking at my privates..! This is.. unexpectedly arousing...)
There thou go, mortals...
(E-Erm... are they judging me?)

{embarrassed} W-Wait, Oz, is h-he actually gonna strip?! {!reset}
{color} ( Yes, mein Fräulein. It is called 'Strip Poker' after all. ) {!reset}

It seems that thee blessing has strayed far upon thee...pitiable.
{color} ( I'm not quite sure what she means.. ) {!reset}
Unfortunately, thee must bid farewell to one of thy garments...
Interesting.. let's see what thee removes this time, lowly mortal!
Ah! It seems I do not have to strip yet! Such is a joyous day for me! Thee, on the other hand...
An unfortunate outcome, however, thee will do much better next round! Trust me, the threads of fate are telling me this!
Hehe, mein {chuuni} Edelstein der Dunkelheit {!reset} protected me from any harm!
Thee hath played sub par.
~name~, at least be glad thy fate has blessed thee to divest upon thee {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung's {!reset} holy gaze!

Impress me, ~player~, for I am the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung, Sovereign of Immernachtreich-{!reset}
{color} ( Fischl, please let ~player~ strip in peace. ) {!reset}
May thee weep for mercy within mein gaze!
Retribution hath cursed upon thee!
Reap what thee sow, ~name~...
Exceptional!
Show more of thy body, mortal... {embarrassed} n-not like I'm a pervert or anything, but.. to be in more of a fair playing field... {!reset}
Interesting.. shalt thee preform a stripping performance as well? {embarrassed} I-I mean, just.. take them off! {!reset}
I wonder what thou will take off this time, mortal...
Do not be afraid to show your body in it's full glory, mortal...
Well, thee sure seems happy... {embarrassed}Oz, I wasn't aware we were going to be surrounded by perverts.{!reset}
Oho, it seems thee hast lost.. do not shiver in fear, as I am quite merciful!
Do not worry, mortal- I, Fischl, {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung,{!reset} will not gaze my ethereal judgment upon any of thy apparel!
Impress me, mortal!
